title: Anonymous comments
author: VD
content_html: A word of warning. Because it has gotten too confusing too keep track of them, all Anonymous comments will be shot on sight from now on. If you’re going to comment and aren’t logged in with Google, make use of the Name/URL option; you don’t need to enter a URL, just a name.
content_text: A word of warning.  Because it has gotten too confusing too keep track of them, all Anonymous comments will be shot on sight from now on.  If you’re going to comment and aren’t logged in with Google, make use of the Name/URL option; you don’t need to enter a URL, just a name.
